mapper.update: update sl_pd_artno set SALE_REGION_CODE=#{saleRegionCode}, SALE_STATUS=#{saleStatus}, PD_PLACE=#{pdPlace}, PD_STANDARD=#{pdStandard}, PD_INGREDIENT=#{pdIngredient}, FOOD_LICENSE=#{foodLicense}, SHELF_LIFE=#{shelfLife}, STORAGE_CONDITION=#{storageCondition}, NORMS_SPECIFICATION=#{normsSpecification}, UPD_ID=#{updId}, UPD_TIME=#{updTime}, VER=VER + 1 where ARTNO_ID=#{artnoId} and SL_CODE=#{slCode} AND DEL_FLG = 0
